tool_description: This API retrieves detailed information about a video from the Dailymotion platform using a specified URL.
name: Dailymotion Video Information API
title: Dailymotion Video Information API

api_list.name: Dailymotion Video Information
api_list.description: This API retrieves detailed information about a video from the Dailymotion platform using a specified URL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dailymotion-video-information-api.p.rapidapi.com/dailymotion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dailymotion-video-information-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dailymotion-video-information-api.p.rapidapi.com/dailymotion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dailymotion-video-information-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
